creator: Fun Greetings
descriptionHtml:
Chinese New Year, Spring Festival or the Lunar New Year, is the festival that celebrates the beginning of a new year on the traditional lunisolar Chinese calendar. Happy Chinese New Year Cards GIFs App is a great way to send festive wishes & greetings to loved ones.


Greet the new tiger year with cheer and express our love, care and appreciation for people around us. Spending time with family is central to the holiday season. The customs and traditions concerning the celebration of the New Year vary widely, and the evening preceding the New Year's Day is frequently regarded as an occasion for Chinese families to gather for the annual reunion dinner. Celebration continues from the first day of the new year to the Lantern Festival, held on the 15th day of the year. Happy Chinese New Year Greeting Cards Wishes GIFs App provide you with beautiful greetings and wishes in the form of ecards and animated GIFs which are carefully selected for your family and friends celebrating the lunar new year.

Happy Chinese New Year Greeting Cards Wishes GIFs is also an easy, fast, safe, and fun way to share greeting cards & wishes while still adhering to the current social distancing initiatives. Let family and friends receive your greeting cards & wishes and feel your sincere expression of love even if you cannot be with them in person. Select from our collection of awesome meaningful wishes and messages to send out with greeting cards all occasions to express your sincere gratitude and wishes during this holiday celebration and make their Lunar New Year celebration extra special and meaningful.

The highlights of Happy Chinese New Year Greeting Cards Wishes GIFs App:-
🧧 100% Free Download!
🧧 Large collection of Happy New Year greeting cards for all occasions for family friends and loved ones which are updated regularly.
🧧 Greetings cards & gifs with festive happy new year wishes from new year eve till the 15th Lantern Festival celebrations.
🧧 Easy to use. Just select, personalize and share. Customize the greeting cards & gifs with your own messages, or if you're not feeling too creative just send the greeting cards with wishes.
🧧 Fun and expressive Animated GIF to convey your sincere wishes and messages. Pick one send to family and friends to put a smile on their faces and make their Chinese New Year celebration extra special and meaningful.
🧧 Share them on Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, Line and to many more social platforms. The greeting cards & wishes can also be shared via Bluetooth, Email and Message
🧧 Free Games for your enjoyment during the new year holidays
🧧 Requires only a small space on your device

Happy Chinese New Year Greeting Cards Wishes GIFs is 100% free. This application is available for any Android users. Sharing free greeting cards & wishes is very easy with this app. Browse through our colourful bright collection of exclusively edited Lunar New Year Countdown Celebration Images and choose your favourite greeting cards all occasions and share! It is that simple! There's no limit to the number of greetings and best wishes you can send.

This app will be updated from yearly with the latest of Free Chinese New Year countdown celebration images, so make sure that you keep coming back again to sync your smartphone to get the latest updated selection. We hope that receiving these greeting cards & wishes from you will help put a bright smile on your loved ones faces and warm their hearts during this new year celebration!

Download Happy Chinese New Year Greeting Cards GIFs app now and share with family and friends this Lunar New Year! Do check out our other apps and feel free to give us some feedback for continuous improvement. Download the app right away and wish your near and dear one on this special occasion with beautiful collection of greetings.

This is awesome way to say Happy Chinese New Year! Start spreading joyful greetings to family and friends and welcome the new tiger year now! 新年快乐!
